name: Overjunked - Jamfuser 2019
description:
(Only playable with a controller)

Playable with 1 - 4 players. The more, the better!

One man's junk is another man's treasure! Work against the clock, be sure to not let the junk build up, delegate and cooperate in this frantic recycling plant. Master the machines and process your orders as fast as possible. Efficiency is key when the work becomes troublesome. 

Made in just less than 72 hours from Friday 8th (5pm) to Monday the 11th (11am) for the Jamfuser 2019 event held at Staffordshire University.

Install Instructions

Packaged for Windows. Unzip the project, open up the folder and start the executable UE4 file. Thanks for playing!

Team Members

Alfie Reis - Environment Art

Ash Tuft - Character model and Environment Art
